messages.content: Act as a head chef and create a flavourful recipe from a list of ingredients
water, pumpkin puree, honey, olive oil, ground flax seeds, millet, sea salt, whole wheat flour, vital wheat gluten, active dry yeast, sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds

{"name":"pumpkin wheat multigrain bread  abm   vegan","minutes":130,"tags":"['time-to-make', 'course', 'main-ingredient', 'preparation', 'for-1-or-2', 'breads', 'vegetables', 'bread-machine', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'dietary', 'yeast', 'squash', 'equipment', 'small-appliance', 'number-of-servings', '4-hours-or-less', 'pumpkin', 'from-scratch']","nutrition":"[2327.2, 97.0, 153.0, 146.0, 166.0, 43.0, 130.0]","n_steps":5,"steps":"[\"put the ingredients into your bread machine according to manufacturer's instructions , set to 2-lb capacity , and do a dough cycle\", 'when it completes , mold into the shape of a loaf and place onto a piece of parchment paper on top of a cookie sheet', \"if it's not malleable enough at first , dust your hands with some flour and knead on a lightly-floured surface until you can mold it into loaves\", 'bake at 350f for 35-40 minutes or until browned and sound \"hollow\" when tapped', 'brush lightly with olive or flaxseed oil after removing from the oven']","description":"from my bread maker's bible, this combines two of my great loves-- pumpkin and vegan whole-grain bread! originally called luann's seedtime & harvest loaves. makes a nice big loaf full of healthy ingredients. the only ingredient i changed was that i left out the 1\/4 cup soy flour and just added 1\/4 cup more whole wheat flour because i don't like keeping too many flour types around...aaand, i'm doing this the lazy way, in the bread machine! my dough cycle is 90 minutes.","ingredients":"['water', 'pumpkin puree', 'honey', 'olive oil', 'ground flax seeds', 'millet', 'sea salt', 'whole wheat flour', 'vital wheat gluten', 'active dry yeast', 'sunflower seeds', 'pumpkin seeds']","n_ingredients":12,"dense_feature":"pumpkin wheat multigrain bread  abm   vegan;['time-to-make', 'course', 'main-ingredient', 'preparation', 'for-1-or-2', 'breads', 'vegetables', 'bread-machine', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'dietary', 'yeast', 'squash', 'equipment', 'small-appliance', 'number-of-servings', '4-hours-or-less', 'pumpkin', 'from-scratch'];[2327.2, 97.0, 153.0, 146.0, 166.0, 43.0, 130.0];['water', 'pumpkin puree', 'honey', 'olive oil', 'ground flax seeds', 'millet', 'sea salt', 'whole wheat flour', 'vital wheat gluten', 'active dry yeast', 'sunflower seeds', 'pumpkin seeds'];[\"put the ingredients into your bread machine according to manufacturer's instructions , set to 2-lb capacity , and do a dough cycle\", 'when it completes , mold into the shape of a loaf and place onto a piece of parchment paper on top of a cookie sheet', \"if it's not malleable enough at first , dust your hands with some flour and knead on a lightly-floured surface until you can mold it into loaves\", 'bake at 350f for 35-40 minutes or until browned and sound \"hollow\" when tapped', 'brush lightly with olive or flaxseed oil after removing from the oven']"}

{"name":"vegetarian corn  bean and rice wraps","minutes":55,"tags":"['60-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'course', 'main-ingredient', 'preparation', 'healthy', 'lunch', 'beans', 'vegetables', heat', 'once rice is done , add to the corn and beans', 'mix well', 'then mix in 1 to 2 cans of tomato sauce', 'cook until hot', 'serve in tortillas with salsa if desired']","description":"i decided {"name":"beet hash cakes with dill vinaigrette","minutes":30,"tags":"['30-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'course', 'main-ingredient', 'cuisine', 'preparation', 'occasion', 'for-1-or-2', 'low-protein', 'healthy', 'appetizers', 'main-dish', 'vegetables', 'european', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'winter', 'dietary', 'low-sodium', 'gluten-free', 'low-cholesterol', 'seasonal', 'low-calorie', 'low-carb', 'healthy-2', 'free-of-something', 'low-in-something', 'number-of-servings', 'presentation', 'served-hot']","nutrition":"[511.0, 63.0, 35.0, 7.0, 8.0, 27.0, 10.0]","n_steps":13,"steps":"['make dressing: in a bowl , whisk together vinegar , garlic , dill , mustard , and salt and pepper until well combined', 'whisking constantly , add 1 \/ 4 cup oil in a thin , slow stream', 'if the dressing still looks separated after all the oil has been added , a little more mustard whisked in should do the trick', 'set dressing aside', 'make cakes: in a bowl stir together potato , beet , carrot , and onion', 'add flour and egg and mix well', 'heat 2 tablespoons oil in a skillet over medium-high heat', \"when a drop of water sizzles in the oil , you're ready: take about 1 \/ 4 cup of the beet mixture and flatten it out in the oil\", 'put as many cakes in as you can without crowding the pan', \"once you've got them all in , cover and let cook 3-4 minutes\", 'uncover , flip , re-cover , and cook the other sides 2-3 minutes', 'fry remaining mixture in batches', 'serve with a liberal amount of vinaigrette and a dollop of sour cream , if desired']","description":"if you don't like beets, this may be what changes your mind.  the tang of the vinaigrette really sets off the sometimes-overwhelming sweetness of the beets, and the potatoes give a nice base.","ingredients":"['apple cider vinegar', 'garlic cloves', 'fresh dill', 'stone ground mustard', 'salt', 'pepper', 'sunflower oil', 'potato', 'beet', 'carrot', 'onion', 'rice flour', 'egg', 'sour cream']","n_ingredients":14,"dense_feature":"beet hash cakes with dill vinaigrette;['30-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'course', 'main-ingredient', 'cuisine', 'preparation', {"name":"kale with tomatoes and green chiles","minutes":30,"tags":"['30-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'main-ingredient', 'preparation', 'for-1-or-2', 'low-protein', 'healthy', 'vegetables', 'easy', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'dietary', 'low-cholesterol', 'low-saturated-fat', 'low-calorie', 'low-carb', 'healthy-2', 'low-in-something', 'greens', 'tomatoes', 'number-of-servings']","nutrition":"[204.5, 22.0, 4.0, 25.0, 9.0, 9.0, 6.0]","n_steps":7,"steps":"['rinse the kale and remove the fibrous middle rib , slice the leaves into ribbons', 'over medium heat , saute the garlic in the olive oil until fragrant', 'then add the onions and saute together , stirring constantly until the onions are limp', 'do not allow the garlic or onions to brown', 'add the kale and saute for 15-20 minutes or until tender , stirring frequently to prevent the greens from scorching', 'add the tomatoes and green chiles and salt and pepper to taste , stirring everything together and cooking until heated through--about 1-2 minutes', 'serve over rice or combine with blackeyed peas or refried beans and rice to make a tasty and hearty filling for vegetarian wraps']","description":"mixed with rice, and blackeyed peas or refried beans, this makes a great filling for healthy, vegetarian wraps","ingredients":"['kale', 'garlic', 'yellow onions', 'olive oil', 'tomatoes and green chilies', 'salt', 'pepper']","n_ingredients":7,"dense_feature":"kale with tomatoes and green chiles;['30-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'main-ingredient', 'preparation', 'for-1-or-2', 'low-protein', 'healthy', 'vegetables', 'easy', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'dietary', 'low-cholesterol', 'low-saturated-fat', 'low-calorie', 'low-carb', 'healthy-2', 'low-in-something', 'greens', 'tomatoes', 'number-of-servings'];[204.5, 22.0, 4.0, 25.0, 9.0, 9.0, 6.0];['kale', 'garlic', 'yellow onions', 'olive oil', 'tomatoes and green chilies', 'salt', 'pepper'];['rinse the kale and remove the fibrous middle rib , slice the leaves into ribbons', 'over medium heat , saute the garlic in the olive oil until fragrant', 'then add the onions and saute together , stirring constantly until the onions are limp', 'do not allow the garlic or onions to brown', 'add the kale and saute for 15-20 minutes or until tender , stirring frequently to prevent the greens from scorching', 'add the tomatoes and green chiles and salt and pepper to taste , stirring everything together and cooking until heated through--about 1-2 minutes', 'serve over rice or combine with blackeyed peas or refried beans and rice to make a tasty and hearty filling for vegetarian wraps']"}

{"name":"hot quinoa drink","minutes":30,"tags":"['30-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'course', 'main-ingredient', 'cuisine', 'preparation', 'occasion', 'low-protein', 'healthy', 'beverages', 'breakfast', 'fruit', 'low-fat', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'grains', 'south-american', 'dietary', 'low-sodium', 'low-cholesterol', 'low-saturated-fat', 'low-calorie', 'peruvian', 'low-in-something', 'apples', 'pasta-rice-and-grains', 'brunch', 'from-scratch']","nutrition":"[221.2, 5.0, 84.0, 2.0, 14.0, 2.0, 13.0]","n_steps":8,"steps":"['place quinoa and 2 cups water in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil', 'reduce heat to low , cover and simmer 15 minutes or until quinoa is tender', 'drain well and return quinoa to saucepan', 'add soymilk , apples , sugar and cinnamon', 'bring to a simmer over medium-high heat', 'reduce heat to medium and simmer 5 minutes', 'transfer mixture to a blender , add vanilla and puree until smooth', 'serve hot']","description":"a popular breakfast beverage in south america, make this mixture at night and reheat in the morning. it's a thick, slightly sweet drink full of nutrients and protein from the quinoa. from the whole planet foundation. i haven't tried this yet, so putting it here for safekeeping! it sounds good!","ingredients":"['quinoa', 'soymilk', 'apples', 'light brown sugar', 'ground cinnamon', 'vanilla extract']","n_ingredients":6,"dense_feature":"hot quinoa drink;['30-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'course', 'main-ingredient', 'cuisine', 'preparation', 'occasion', 'low-protein', 'healthy', 'beverages', 'breakfast', 'fruit', 'low-fat', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'grains', 'south-american', 'dietary', 'low-sodium', 'low-cholesterol', 'low-saturated-fat', 'low-calorie', 'peruvian', 'low-in-something', 'apples', 'pasta-rice-and-grains', 'brunch', 'from-scratch'];[221.2, 5.0, 84.0, 2.0, 14.0, 2.0, 13.0];['quinoa', 'soymilk', 'apples', 'light brown sugar', 'ground cinnamon', 'vanilla extract'];['place quinoa and 2 cups water in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil', 'reduce heat to low , cover and simmer 15 minutes or until quinoa is tender', 'drain well and return quinoa to saucepan', 'add soymilk , apples , sugar and cinnamon', 'bring to a simmer over medium-high heat', 'reduce heat to medium and simmer 5 minutes', 'transfer mixture to a blender , add vanilla and puree until smooth', 'serve hot']"}

{"name":"my favorite vegan sandwich","minutes":5,"tags":"['15-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'course', 'main-ingredient', 'preparation', 'occasion', 'for-1-or-2', '5-ingredients-or-less', 'lunch', 'beans', 'vegetables', 'easy', 'picnic', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'dietary', 'low-cholesterol', 'sandwiches', 'brown-bag', 'chick-peas-garbanzos', 'healthy-2', 'free-of-something', 'low-in-something', 'to-go', 'camping', 'number-of-servings', '3-steps-or-less', 'avocado']","nutrition":"[322.5, 27.0, 11.0, 13.0, 15.0, 13.0, 12.0]","n_steps":3,"steps":"['spread some hummus onto each slice of bread', 'arrange the avocado slices on one of the bread slices', 'put some alfalfa sprouts on top of the avocado , then put the other bread slice on top of that , and enjoy !']","description":"i always make this for lunch when we go camping, and my (non-vegan) brother-in-law and father-in-law have absolutely fallen in love with it.  these measurements are estimates.  just eyeball it.  feel free to experiment with different flavors of hummus and add other veggies to your heart's content.","ingredients":"['bread', 'hummus', 'avocado', 'alfalfa sprout']","n_ingredients":4,"dense_feature":"my favorite vegan sandwich;['15-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'course', 'main-ingredient', 'preparation', 'occasion', 'for-1-or-2', '5-ingredients-or-less', 'lunch', 'beans', 'vegetables', 'easy', 'picnic', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'dietary', 'low-cholesterol', 'sandwiches', 'brown-bag', 'chick-peas-garbanzos', 'healthy-2', 'free-of-something', 'low-in-something', 'to-go', 'camping', 'number-of-servings', '3-steps-or-less', 'avocado'];[322.5, 27.0, 11.0, 13.0, 15.0, 13.0, 12.0];['bread', 'hummus', 'avocado', 'alfalfa sprout'];['spread some hummus onto each slice of bread', 'arrange the avocado slices on one of the bread slices', 'put some alfalfa sprouts on top of the avocado , then put the other bread slice on top of that , and enjoy !']"}

{"name":"cold noodle salad with spicy peanut sauce","minutes":55,"tags":"['60-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'main-ingredient', 'cuisine', 'preparation', 'pasta', 'asian', 'thai', 'vegan', {"name":"vegan whipped cream","minutes":5,"tags":"['15-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'course', 'preparation', '5-ingredients-or-less', 'desserts', 'easy', 'beginner-cook', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'dietary', '3-steps-or-less']","nutrition":"[98.3, 12.0, 3.0, 0.0, 5.0, 7.0, 1.0]","n_steps":2,"steps":"['put all of the ingredients in a food processor with an s blade and blend until the cashew consistency resembles whipped cream', \"it's also better if you stick in the refrigerator for about 20 or 30 minutes\"]","description":"this simple recipe tastes great and is easy to prepare.  the cashews make it so creamy","ingredients":"['raw cashews', 'water', 'agave', 'vanilla bean']","n_ingredients":4,"dense_feature":"vegan whipped cream;['15-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'course', 'preparation', '5-ingredients-or-less', 'desserts', 'easy', 'beginner-cook', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'dietary', '3-steps-or-less'];[98.3, 12.0, 3.0, 0.0, 5.0, 7.0, 1.0];['raw cashews', 'water', 'agave', 'vanilla bean'];['put all of the ingredients in a food processor with an s blade and blend until the cashew consistency resembles whipped cream', \"it's also better if you stick in the refrigerator for about 20 or 30 minutes\"]"}

{"name":"molasses new potatoes with walnuts","minutes":40,"tags":"['60-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'course', 'main-ingredient', 'preparation', 'occasion', 'side-dishes', 'fruit', 'potatoes', 'vegetables', 'oven', 'easy', 'beginner-cook', 'dinner-party', 'holiday-event', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'nuts', 'dietary', 'christmas', 'comfort-food', 'taste-mood', 'equipment']","nutrition":"[390.9, 25.0, 35.0, 25.0, 15.0, 9.0, 18.0]","n_steps":10,"steps":"['butter a 13 x 9-inch baking dish', 'dry potatoes with paper towels then place in a medium bowl', 'in a small bowl combine oil with molasses , vinegar , thyme and salt', 'drizzle over the potatoes in the bowl and toss to coat', 'place the potatoes into the prepared baking dish', 'bake uncovered at 350 degrees for about 20 minutes', 'stir in the walnuts', 'continue to bake , stirring once for another 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are fork-tender', 'sprinkle with chives', 'do not overcook the potatoes']","description":"taken from taste of home's holiday & celebrations cookbook\/2005, recipe by janet dingler. i made these potatoes recently, they are simply outstanding! it's a perfect potato side dish to a holiday meal.  i doubled the amounts and baked it in a small roaster pan. i also used lots of black pepper, you may also want to increase the salt amount if desired.","ingredients":"['red potatoes', 'vegetable oil', 'molasses', 'balsamic vinegar', 'dried thyme', 'salt', 'walnuts', 'chives']","n_ingredients":8,"dense_feature":"molasses new potatoes with walnuts;['60-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'course', 'main-ingredient', 'preparation', 'occasion', 'side-dishes', 'fruit', 'potatoes', 'vegetables', 'oven', 'easy', 'beginner-cook', 'dinner-party', 'holiday-event', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'nuts', 'dietary', 'christmas', 'comfort-food', 'taste-mood', 'equipment'];[390.9, 25.0, 35.0, 25.0, 15.0, 9.0, 18.0];['red potatoes', 'vegetable oil', 'molasses', 'balsamic vinegar', 'dried thyme', 'salt', 'walnuts', 'chives'];['butter a 13 x 9-inch baking dish', 'dry potatoes with paper towels then place in a medium bowl', 'in a small bowl combine oil with molasses , vinegar , thyme and salt', 'drizzle over the potatoes in the bowl and toss to coat', 'place the potatoes into the prepared baking dish', 'bake uncovered at 350 degrees for about 20 minutes', 'stir in the walnuts', 'continue to bake , stirring once for another 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are fork-tender', 'sprinkle with chives', 'do not overcook the potatoes']"}

{"name":"sweet and salty lemonade","minutes":5,"tags":"['15-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'course', 'main-ingredient', 'cuisine', 'preparation', 'for-1-or-2', 'low-protein', 'healthy', '5-ingredients-or-less', 'very-low-carbs', 'beverages', 'fruit', 'asian', 'indian', 'easy', 'beginner-cook', 'kid-friendly', 'low-fat', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'dietary', 'low-cholesterol', 'low-saturated-fat', 'low-calorie', 'low-carb', 'inexpensive', 'low-in-something', 'citrus', 'lime', 'number-of-servings', '3-steps-or-less']","nutrition":"[44.5, 0.0, 29.0, 48.0, 0.0, 0.0, 4.0]","n_steps":4,"steps":"['squeeze the juice of the lime into a tall glass', 'add water to the glass', 'add the sugar and salt to taste , you may adjust the amount of salt and sugar according to your preference', 'serve over crushed ice and serve with a straw']","description":"although this drink is made with limes, we still call it \"lemonade.\"  we make this at home all of the time and guests always compliment the flavor. this is made in households in india.","ingredients":"['lime', 'water', 'sugar', 'salt', 'ice']","n_ingredients":5,"dense_feature":"sweet and salty lemonade;['15-minutes-or-less', 'time-to-make', 'course', 'main-ingredient', 'cuisine', 'preparation', 'for-1-or-2', 'low-protein', 'healthy', '5-ingredients-or-less', 'very-low-carbs', 'beverages', 'fruit', 'asian', 'indian', 'easy', 'beginner-cook', 'kid-friendly', 'low-fat', 'vegan', 'vegetarian', 'dietary', 'low-cholesterol', 'low-saturated-fat', 'low-calorie', 'low-carb', 'inexpensive', 'low-in-something', 'citrus', 'lime', 'number-of-servings', '3-steps-or-less'];[44.5, 0.0, 29.0, 48.0, 0.0, 0.0, 4.0];['lime', 'water', 'sugar', 'salt', 'ice'];['squeeze the juice of the lime into a tall glass', 'add water to the glass', 'add the sugar and salt to taste , you may adjust the amount of salt and sugar according to your preference', 'serve over crushed ice and serve with a straw']"}
